name: ehwan
description: a game to take care of a virtual pet by sending it pictures

scripts.test: check-node-version --node '>= 6.7.0' && bin/setup && mocha --compilers js:babel-register app/**/*.test.js app/**/*.test.jsx db/**/*.test.js server/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-watch: check-node-version --node '>= 6.7.0' && bin/setup && mocha --compilers js:babel-register --watch app/**/*.test.js app/**/*.test.jsx db/**/*.test.js server/**/*.test.js
scripts.build: check-node-version --node '>= 6.7.0' && bin/setup && webpack & node-sass app/sass/main.scss -o public/stylesheets
scripts.build-watch: check-node-version --node '>= 6.7.0' && bin/setup && node-sass -w app/sass/main.scss -o public/stylesheets & webpack -w

author: jeunlee
